game.name: Train Simulator: DB ICE 3 EMU Add-On
game.shortDescription: The ICE 3 is a fantastic new-generation high speed train introduced in 2000, and now you can take on the challenge of driving this serious train yourself!
game.shortDescriptionEn: The ICE 3 is a fantastic new-generation high speed train introduced in 2000, and now you can take on the challenge of driving this serious train yourself!
